Shifa Panjwani is an aspiring BI Developer currently pursuing a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science & Finance at College of Idaho. With a strong interest in data visualization, she enjoys creating intuitive dashboards on Power BI and Tableau to make complex data accessible and actionable. Right now, she's diving deeper into [data-viz](#0) and preparing for the [PL-300 Certification](#0) to further expand her skill set.
